title: 有几个问题
author: z841309249
txt_content:
QQ截图20200211081922.png (18.92 KB, 下载次数: 0)

下载附件

2020-2-11 08:28 上传





第一个问题:第一串红色的字体[大概的意思是点券不足3000]在哪汉化一下!


第二个问题:金币排行榜能不能改一下格式!太丑了!我看别人的服务器都挺好看的!

第3个问题:金币能不能美化一下!





QQ截图20200211082750.png (21.68 KB, 下载次数: 0)

下载附件

2020-2-11 08:33 上传





点券插件的前面能不能在哪汉化一下!我是真找了好久都没找到!
第二个是VIP能在那汉化一下么?

replies.author: z841309249
replies.txt_content:
世予予 发表于 2020-2-11 08:57
%tag

你自己修改一下就可以了
大佬配置文件我给你看看吧!
message:
  noPermission: '&7%tag &c缺少权限 &b%extra'
  noConsole: '&7%tag &c控制台无法使用该命令'
  notIntenger: '&7%tag &6%extra &c不是一个整数'
  command:
    unknown: '&7%tag &c未知命令：''%extra'''
    give: '&7%tag &9/points give <name> <points>'
    take: '&7%tag &9/points take <name> <points>'
    look: '&7%tag &9/points look <name>'
    pay: '&7%tag &9/points give <name> <points>'
    set: '&7%tag &9/points set <name> <points>'
    reset: '&7%tag &9/points reset <name>'
    me: '&7%tag &9/points me'
    lead: '&7%tag &9/points lead [next|prev|#]'
    giveall: '&7%tag &9/points giveall <points>'
    broadcast: '&7%tag &9/points broadcast <name>'
  points:
    success: '&7%tag &9玩家 &a%player &9目前有 &a%amount &9点卷'
    fail: '&7%tag &c交易失败'
    look: '&7%tag &9玩家 &a%player &9有 &a%amount &9点卷'
    pay:
      send: '&7%tag &9你发送了 &a%amount &9点卷给 &a%player'
      receive: '&7%tag &9你从 &a%player &9那收到了 &a%amount &9点卷'
      invalid: '&7%tag &6无法给0点卷或负数点卷'
    lack: '&7%tag &6你没有足够的点卷'
    reset: '&7%tag &a%player &9的点卷已被重置'
    me: '&7%tag &9你有 &a%amount &9点卷'
    successall: '&7%tag Gave &a%amount &9Points &7to %player players'
    failall: '&7%tag &cFailed to give &a%amount &9Points &cto %player players'
  help:
    header: '&9======= &7%tag &9======='
    me: '&7/points me &6: 查看自己的点券'
    give: '&7/points give <name> <points> &6: 给予某玩家点卷'
    take: '&7/points take <name> <points> &6: 减少某玩家点卷'
    look: '&7/points give <name> &6: 查询某玩家的点卷'
    set: '&7/points set <name> <points> &6: 设置某玩家的点券数量'
    reset: '&7/points reset <name> &6: 设置某玩家的点卷为0'
    pay: '&7/points pay <name> <points> &6: 将点卷付给某玩家'
    lead: '&7/points lead [prev/next/page] &6: 点券排行榜'
    giveall: '&7/points giveall <points> &6: Generate points for online players'
    broadcast: '&7/points broadcast <name> &6: Broadcast player''s points'
    reload: '&7/points reload &6: Reload config'
  reload: '&7%tag &6配置文件已经重载'
  broadcast: '&7%tag &9Player &a%player &9has &a%amount &9Points'
